scripts.pkg:win: ncc build -o build/lib index.js && pkg --target node16-win-x64  -o build/agent.exe ./build/lib/index.js && npm run jfrog:push
scripts.pkg:mac: ncc build -o build/lib index.js && pkg --target node16-mac-arm64 -o build/agent-mac-bin ./build/lib/index.js
scripts.pkg-updater:mac: ncc build updater.js -o build/lib  && pkg --target node16-mac-arm64 -o build/agent-updater-mac-bin ./build/lib/index.js
scripts.build: pnpm run pack && pnpm run pkg
